TopicTitle: Atmosphere and Ocean vanish after Mun mission.

Articles.Content: After I did my Mun mission I went back to Kerbin and the water dissapeared. Oddily, my fps is very low my normal at the ksc is 50fps but this time it was around 15 . And Kerbol dissapeared during noon.
Which version are you playing? They released a fix for this bug in patch 1
I played right after I updated so I had patch 1 in the game.
